value:
$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...H-huh?$k$pIs this...a dream?$k$p$EFace_Smile|If this is a dream, then I suppose
I can spend some time relaxing!$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|What are you doing here, ljósálfr?
This is a world of nightmare you've
entered here...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|P-Plumeria!$k$pI only just found myself here.
Can you...tell me where here is?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|We are in Lady Freyja's nightmare.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Lady Freyja's?! That explains the
strength of the dream... I've never
felt anything like it.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course you haven't. It is the
nightmare of Nightmare herself.$k$pThis is no place for a petal-soft
álfr like you, Peony.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|*gasp* Petal soft?$k$pAww... How cute!$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*sigh* I don't have time for your
children's games. I'm looking
for Triandra.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh... Then I'll come with you!$k$pHm? ...Who's that?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Are you...dökkálfar? Do you serve
Freyja, Lady of Nightmare?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Who are you?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I am...Eitr.$k$pForgive me, but I must stop you.
There is no way around the
commands I've been given.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commands? From who?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|She who rules over the nothingness...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The...nothingness?! You don't mean
the force that pushed the dream
realms to the brink of ruin, do you?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If that is true, then you are the
enemy of all dreams...$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|That is why I ask your forgiveness.
I must eliminate you now.$k$p

$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Urgh... I cannot fulfill my duty
after all...$k$pBut...if I'm unable to follow the
commands I've been given, then...
*sob*$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Enough of that now. We don't
have to fight.$k$p$EFace|Why don't you tell us more about
yourself? If we can talk about the
problem, we'll be able to solve it!$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I am...Eitr. I serve the nothingness
and the one who rules it...$k$pI was commanded to eliminate you.$k$pI was told that...Freyja must not
be revived... The Lady of Nightmare
cannot live again.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Freyja...alive again?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Triandra and I have been seeking
a way to reawaken Lady Freyja...
We eventually found a way.$k$pLady Freyja will return to us soon.
Or, rather, she was supposed to.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|That is why I was sent here.$k$pI am to bring a final end to the Lady
of Nightmare and turn the dreams
of mortals to unending oblivion.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is you and your kind that face
your final end!$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Eek!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait! ...Frightening her won't help.
I feel bad for her. Don't you?$k$pThis isn't her fault! If she's been
commanded to do this by the ruler
of the nothingness, then...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Petal soft, as I said. If the nothingness
has come, we must be on our guard.$k$pYou remember, don't you, Peony?
We once fought the nothingness
together—to save the world...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course I remember. If we failed
to stop the nothingness, the mortals
would all die, lost forever in sleep.$k$pSo we fought...and we defeated the
nothingness. You, me, Mirabilis, and
Triandra—all of us together.$k$p$EFace|...Hm? What was that sound?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|What did you hear?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|It sounded like a voice...somewhere
far off. I think...I think it may have
been Triandra calling out to me!$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Triandra? Why would she call
to you over another dökkálfr?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Now is not the time for such things.$k$pIt sounded like her voice was coming
from over in this direction. C'mon—
let's go!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Come with us, Eitr. You have
nothing to fear as long as you're
with us.$k$pTogether, we can defeat the
nothingness just like we did
before, all right?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Th-thank you... *sniff*$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|You too, Plumeria. Come on.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Come...with you? Hm. For Triandra—
but...for you? No.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You needn't be like that! Dream-King
Freyr always said it was best if we all
got along.$k$p$EFace_Smile|There's no better time to start than
now, I say. But...if you'll only do it for
Triandra, so be it!$k$pYou two must be close.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-she's is a dökkálfr, like me—and
she has always been willing to listen
to what I have to say.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I like Triandra too. She's quiet, but
I can tell she has a kind heart, and
I...worry about her.$k$p$EFace_Anger|She seems like the kind of person
who'd do anything for those she's
close to, with no regard for herself.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Yes, that sounds like her.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Oh! Is that— I think I can hear
Mirabilis talking in her sleep!
It's not just Triandra's voice now!$k$pLet's go. We have to save Mirabilis
and Triandra!$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|That half-conscious álfr is no concern
of mine. But...if they're already with
one another, it can't be helped.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_フレイヤ味方,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$pPlumeria... Triandra... Come to me.$k$pThe realm of dreams depends on you.$k$p

$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|This heat is intense... I need to find
some shade.$k$pIt's hard to believe everyone is still
swimming and running in this heat.$k$pGunnthrá and Ylgr have been here
before, and they seemed to get
used to the heat, but...$k$pI feel faint even in the shade!$k$pTh-this won't do... I need to lie
down for a moment.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Hm... So she made it here too,
did she?$k$p

$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|Ahh... What a delightful chill...
What is— Oh!$k$pSome sort of frozen treat?
Did someone leave it here
for me?$k$pWhat a thoughtful thing to do...$k$pIt's still cold... Whoever left it for
me must still be nearby.$k$pI have to thank them somehow,
whoever it was!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Ah! There you are, Fjorm.
We were just looking for you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|Gunnthrá! You got here at the
perfect moment.$k$pI was about to look for whoever
left me this frosty treat.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Oh! So Lady Nifl visited you
too, did she?$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|...Huh? Lady Nifl?$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|That's right. She brought us frozen
treats as well.$k$pShe seems to have developed quite
the affinity for them while here.$k$pShe buys more than she can have
by herself, so she gives some to us.$k$pShe always claims she got so much
because they had extra or because
the flavors were mixed wrong...$k$pShe doesn't want to admit she's
doing something nice for us.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|I see... So it is from Lady Nifl, then...$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Were you looking to thank her?$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|I would have, but she snuck the treat
next to me as I was resting in the
shade with my eyes closed.$k$pIf I try to thank her, I suspect she'll
act like she has no idea what I'm
talking about.$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Yes, that does sound like Lady Nifl...
But still, not thanking her doesn't feel
quite right either...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Oh, I know! There are lots of pretty
flowers blooming along the dunes,
aren't there?$k$pWe can use them to make Nifl
a flower crown or a necklace
and give it to her as a present!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|What a lovely idea! Flowers would
complement her well, I'm sure.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|Wonderful! We should hurry and
get started.$k$p...Ah, but I need to finish this frozen
treat of mine first.$k$pIt would be a waste to let it melt!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Heh, true enough... Oh, but, Fjorm...
if you eat it too fast, you'll—$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|HNG— My head! Owowow...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Haha! I'm so glad you could join
us here this year, Fjorm! This is
so much fun.$k$pI hope Hríd can join in next year!$k$p
